title: Includes persons with disabilities within the definition of head of household for the senior citizens' tax abatement for rent-controlled and regulated property
summary: Includes persons with disabilities (defined) within the definition of head of household for purposes of making them eligible for the senior citizens' tax abatement for rent-controlled and rent-regulated property.
